The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

We at the Patrika Group are proud to be one of the most respected Hindi daily newspapers. Since our inception in 1956, we have built a reputation for honest journalism, transparency, and credibility. Over the years, we have expanded beyond print to include digital platforms, radio, cable, billboards, television, events, entertainment, and social initiatives.

Our mission at Patrika is simple: “The reader should come first." We believe in putting you, our reader, above everything else, including advertisers. This commitment shows in our honest and accurate reporting for latest news, live coverage. We cover news in eight states including Rajasthan, UP, MP, and 34 cities, and publish over 250 editions, so you can stay connected with real-time updates wherever you are.

Our Hindi news and Epaper mobile app provides quick access to local news as well as politics, national and world events, entertainment, gadgets, automobiles, sports, astrology, religion, and business.

Our mission, "the reader should come first," drives us to focus on what matters to you. We continuously launch new initiatives to serve you better, such as the Patrika News App, which offers smooth and easy navigation for Hindi news on your mobile devices.

Why choose our Hindi News App?
We deliver Hindi news for all types of readers, viewers and listeners. Our updates are immediate and trustworthy, and we focus on rich visual storytelling through photos and videos as well. The Patrika Hindi News App offers real-time, comprehensive coverage of a wide selection of genres, from politics to business and beyond.

description:
For over 90 years, The Indian Express has been read by those who have their own unique point of view of looking at things. With coverage based on comprehensive analysis, and with fearless reporting, we empower our readers with the truth behind every matter. We go the whole length to get to the crux of every issue. And we don't just stop there, but ferret out every detail that brings out the how, why, where and what next of the subject. So, our readers can formulate their own stands on issues in a bias-free manner. We are the Journalism of Courage.

Get on-the-go access to breaking news, India news, live coverage, photos, videos and more. The Indian Express is your one-stop solution for news on the go. Stay updated with Entertainment news, Tech news, Gadgets news, India news, Politics news, Sports news, Cricket news and Bollywood news. Get live news coverage on major events including sports, reviews, cricket and more.

Our revamped home feed gives you instant access to the latest news with an aggregated news experience across your most loved topics. This leads to better content discovery and performance, and also enhances the overall user experience on the Indian Express app through a clean, seamless and ad-free interface.

The key features of the Indian Express App are -

1. Collated news experience - The new home screen gives you the best news across your favourite sections i.e Latest news, Opinions, Audio, Videos, Technology, Entertainment and Sports in India and across the globe
2. Dedicated Audio/Video and Photos section - Experience the best podcasts, videos and photos from our rich library
3. ePaper - Get instant access to our e-newspapers and magazines
4. Offline Reading - Bookmark stories and read news in offline mode even without internet
5. Swipe for Next - Swiping left & right from the article page gives you instant access to other stories for a seamlessly reading experience
6. Share - Share stories with your friends using Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Email & more!


Indian Express is one of the largest english newspaper website in India, with an expanding repertoire and rapidly expanding presence.

description:
WALL STREET JOURNAL (iOS) 

Download the WSJ App Today

Staying ahead of the competition means staying up to date with the facts. Get the trusted insights, in-depth analysis and real-time updates you need from the WSJ App.

Full Access to WSJ, Anywhere, Anytime

Real Time Market News - Never Miss a Critical Development

The WSJ App provides comprehensive access that will help you better understand and navigate the complexities of today’s financial world. Regardless of your investing experience, download the app to make more sound financial decisions. 

Stay ahead, stay informed – with The Wall Street Journal App.


Your subscription will renew automatically each month and payment will be charged to your iTunes Account within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of your subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Stay informed with the latest updates from Hindustan Times, India’s premier source for reliable news. With over 100 years of exemplary journalism since 1924, we bring you the fastest breaking news and comprehensive coverage on politics, business, entertainment, sports, and more. Whether you're looking for live updates or in-depth analysis, our platform offers a truly immersive reading experience.

Why choose Hindustan Times? Our blend of editorial excellence and comprehensive coverage makes us the best news app in India. Our team of award-winning reporters and editors work tirelessly to provide unbiased, fact-checked reporting, ensuring you receive accurate news from the frontlines. With a personalized news feed based on your reading preferences, discover the content you care about, from live news to insightful columns and analysis.

Expect comprehensive coverage with dedicated sections:
- Politics & Governance: Stay updated on Parliament sessions, state elections, and policy changes.
- National News: Access breaking news stories from all 28 states and 8 Union Territories.
- World News: Understand international affairs, including US-India relations and global conflicts.
- Business & Economy: Stay ahead with updates on stock markets, startups, and personal finance tips.
- Technology: Discover the latest in AI, gadgets, and cybersecurity developments.
- Sports: Follow cricket (IPL, international), football, and Olympic events closely.
- Entertainment: Get the latest buzz on Bollywood, Hollywood, and OTT platforms.
- Lifestyle: Explore articles on health, travel, food, and much more.
- Cities: Enjoy hyperlocal news delivered directly from your city like Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru, and Kolkata.
- Opinion & Analysis: Read expert columns and editorials from renowned journalists.

Key features of the Hindustan Times app:
- Live Breaking News Notifications: Get the fastest alerts for breaking news stories.
- Personalized News Feed: Tailor your news consumption according to your interests.
- Dark Mode: Enjoy comfortable reading during night hours.
- Multimedia Content: Access video news, podcasts, and photo galleries.
- Language Options: Experience the app in English, Bangla and Telgu
- E-paper Access: Subscribers get exclusive access to the electronic version of the newspaper.
- Ad-free Experience: Premium users enjoy reading without any interruptions.
- Shareable Content: Easily share articles across your social networks.
- Minimal Data Consumption: Fast loading times even with limited bandwidth.

Trust our legacy of over a century in delivering quality journalism. With a team known for investigative excellence, we combat misinformation and deliver verified news. Each article is crafted with integrity to uphold our commitment to unbiased reporting.

Join millions of readers and experience the future of news consumption. Download the Hindustan Times app today and enable notifications to never miss a beat.

Our continued success and credibility stem from our rich heritage and global recognition in journalism. Explore the app to see why thousands trust Hindustan Times for their daily news updates. 

Download now and experience the robust features and trusted journalism that makes Hindustan Times the best news app in India. Stay connected to the stories that matter most.

Local Content Aggregator - aDumAVar, i tana tangkai lawrkhawmtu - a dum a var

aDumAVar app-a tih theih nghal langsar zualte:
* Fakna leh Listing awlsam takin i phone atangin i call mai thei - adumavar fakna
* District level newspaper awlsam takin i chhiar thei - adumavar news
* Polls platform-ah i opinion hlu tak hmangin ngaihdan i sawi thei - adumavar polls

What is it?
A mobile app based platform for aggregating local content, news, listings & classifieds (fakna) & polls. The platform is based on a system that is patent pending. The platform has three modules :
- adumavar.fakna
- adumavar.news
- adumavar.polls

How?
Instead of local newspaper agencies having their own independent digital platforms, the innovation is in aggregating and providing them with a single platform to post their news content.

Why should I download the app?
The platform also addresses the issue of localizing advertisements. Currently, each newspaper in a state or region publishes general advertisements that do not always apply to readers in the other local areas. Now you can get your district specific news & ads content all in one place.

Still not convinced?

All of our news are posted by accredited journalists, so if you're tired of all the news that goes around on social media with no verifiable sources, we're sure this is the news app for you. Join the cause and help us fight fake news by downloading the app. Cheers!

A PLAY Games é uma publicação mensal que concentra - há mais de dez anos - as maiores novidades, lançamentos, análises, dicas e curiosidades deste segmento. Sua especialidade são detonados, roteiros completos e minuciosos dos jogos mais populares da geração PlayStation.

• Duração da assinatura e quantidade de edições enviadas durante a assinatura: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano (1 year subscription) – 12 edições 
• Assinatura de 6 meses (6 months subscription) – 6 edições 
• Assinatura de 1 mês (1 month subscription) – 1 edição 

• Preço da assinatura auto-renovável e edições avulsas: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano - Preço: US$ 30.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 6 meses - Preço: US$ 15.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 1 mês - Preço: US$ 2.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Edição avulsa – Preço: US$ 2.99 

• O pagamento será debitado da sua conta do iTunes no momento da confirmação da compra 

• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a renovação automática seja cancelada pelo menos 24 horas antes do final do período vigente 

• A renovação da sua assinatura será cobrada no prazo de 24 horas antes do final do período vigente e identificada o custo da renovação 

• As assinaturas podem ser gerenciados pelo usuário e a auto-renovação pode ser cancelada. Isso pode ser feito nas configurações da conta do usuário após a compra 

• Nenhum cancelamento da assinatura atual é permitida durante o período de assinatura vigente 

• Por favor, encontre nossos Termos e Condições e Política de Privacidade em: http://www.europanet.com.br/privacidade/ios/
